   sphinx-quickstart on Fri Jun 25 02:07:31 2021.

   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Numuse's documentation!!
==================================

Wecome to Numuse, this is a package for analyzing musical ideas and testing out conjectures about what makes certain ideas sound good.

To get started with the notation please watch my `introductory video <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N2go7xhJ9lY>`_

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   install
   support
   abbreviations
